FAQ.question: How do I reduce my character count?
FAQ.answer: Using active voice instead of passive voice in your sentences, removing redundant words is an easy way to reduce your word count.

FAQ.question: What is the limit to put character in character count?
FAQ.answer: Character limits are very popular on the Internet these days. The one that most people are likely to be aware of is the 140 character limit for tweets on Twitter, but character limits are not exclusive to Twitter. There are limitations on text messaging (SMS), Yelp ratings, Facebook updates, Pinterest pins, Reddit titles and articles, eBay titles and details as well as many more. Knowing these boundaries, as well as being able to see you approach them, will make it easier for you to articulate yourself within the limits imposed
